title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. You will work on cutting-edge web applications using modern frameworks and technologies.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and develop scalable web applications
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams
- Mentor junior developers
- Participate in code reviews

Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in full stack development
- Strong knowledge of React, Node.js, and MongoDB
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure)
- Excellent problem-solving skills
company_description: Tech Innovations is a leading software development company specializing in web and mobile applications for enterprises.

title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning
description:
Join our AI team as a Data Scientist to build cutting-edge machine learning models.

What You'll Do:
- Develop and deploy ML models
- Analyze large datasets
- Collaborate with engineering teams
- Present insights to stakeholders

Qualifications:
- Master's degree in CS/Statistics
- 3+ years ML experience
- Strong Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch skills
- Experience with cloud ML platforms
company_description: DataMind Solutions provides AI-powered analytics and insights for businesses worldwide.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
We're seeking a talented DevOps Engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines.

Responsibilities:
- Manage AWS/Azure infrastructure
- Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
- Monitor system performance
- Implement security best practices
- Automate deployment processes

Requirements:
- 3+ years DevOps experience
- Strong knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes
- Experience with Jenkins, GitLab CI
- Scripting skills (Bash, Python)
company_description: CloudScale Systems offers enterprise cloud solutions and DevOps consulting services.

title: Product Manager - SaaS
description:
Looking for an experienced Product Manager to lead our SaaS product development.

Your Role:
- Define product strategy and roadmap
- Work with engineering and design teams
- Conduct market research
- Gather and prioritize requirements
- Launch and iterate on features

Must Have:
- 5+ years product management experience
- SaaS product background
- Strong analytical skills
- Excellent communication
- Technical understanding
company_description: SoftServe India is a global leader in software development and IT consulting services.

title: Frontend Developer - React
description:
We need a passionate Frontend Developer to create beautiful user interfaces.

What We Offer:
- Modern tech stack
- Flexible hours
- Learning opportunities
- Great team culture

What You Need:
- 2+ years React experience
- Strong HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- Understanding of responsive design
- Git proficiency
- Portfolio of work
company_description: DesignHub creates beautiful digital experiences for brands across India.
